domain.description: The main domain you want to use for your DNS server, api etc.

uiSubDomain.description: The subdomain you want to use for accessing the user interface (if enabled)

apiSubDomain.description: The subdomain you want to use for accessing Pektin API (if enabled)

vaultSubDomain.description: The subdomain you want to use for accessing vault

recursorDomain.description: The subdomain you want to use for accessing the recursor (if enabled)

enableUi.description: Whether or not to enable the UI

enableApi.description: Whether or not to enable the API

enableRecursor.description: Whether or not to enable the private recursor

enableRotate.description: Whether or not to auto rotate dns keys at the registrar

createCerts.description: Whether or not to create certificates for the domains hosted on pektin

autoConfigureMainDomain.description: Use registrar API to auto configure the necessary glue and ns records for your main domain

proxyConfig.description: what proxy config to apply to the containers

createProxy.description: whether or not to create the proxy container itself

buildFromSource.description: whether or not to build the pektin containers from source

dev.description: Whether or not to run in development mode and in what dev mode

insecureDevIp.description: the ip you want to use for the dev server if running in 'insecure-online' dev mode
